lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Aug. 29 about the Yankees’ 3-2 victory over the Red Sox in the final scheduled game between the teams at Yankee Stadium described incorrectly a ninth-inning play that put the winning run in scoring position. Brett Gardner, pinch-running for the Yankees, stole second base — not third.
